resources.string: Application initialization failed. The application will exit.
OpenGL initialization failed, your device likely does not support shader model ES2.0, a requirement for UE3.
Not Enough SDCard space for installation.
Error downloading game content. Please try again.
"Game data was either not installed or was deleted. Please connect to the internet and relaunch so it can download!"
Warning: This Android device does not meet the minimum requirement of 512 MB RAM. This application may not run correctly.
Failed Checksum on Composited Split Files
Couldn\'t connect to remote file host.
Update Found, Would you like to update?
No Wifi Found, what would you like to do?
New Market update found, would you like to download it?
Would you like to enable downloading over cellular connections? Depending on your data plan, this may cost you money.
If you choose not to enable downloading over cellular connections, the download will automatically resume when wi-fi is available
XAPK File Validation Complete. Select OK to exit.
XAPK File Validation Failed. Please restart the app and we will re-download the files.
There is not enough memory available on the external card. Please delete some files and try again.
Wifi is not turned on. You may need to enable wifi or use a data service
